Package seasofyore

Class SalvoBattlePhase

java.lang.Object
seasofyore.AbstractGamePhase
seasofyore.BattlePhase
seasofyore.SalvoBattlePhase
All Implemented Interfaces:
GamePhase
public class SalvoBattlePhase extends BattlePhase
Represents the Salvo battle phase in the Seas of Yore game. In this phase, players can take multiple shots in a single turn, based on the number of their remaining ships. The class handles the logic for firing multiple shots, managing animations, and determining victory conditions.

  • Method Details

    • onEnter

      protected void onEnter()
      Initializes the Salvo battle phase when it is entered. Disables interaction with the current player's quadrant and enables interaction with the opponent's quadrant. Initializes shot and animation queues and logs the entry message.
      Overrides:
      onEnter in class BattlePhase

    • handleCellClick

      public void handleCellClick(int x, int y, QuadrantPanel quadrantPanel)
      Handles a cell click event during the Salvo battle phase. Locks the clicked cell for SALVO, queues the shot and its animation, and decrements the remaining shots.
      Specified by:
      handleCellClick in interface GamePhase
      Overrides:
      handleCellClick in class BattlePhase
      Parameters:
      x - the x-coordinate of the clicked cell
      y - the y-coordinate of the clicked cell
      quadrantPanel - the QuadrantPanel where the click occurred

    • render

      public void render(Graphics g)
      Renders any visuals specific to the Salvo battle phase. Draws the falling stone animation if one is active.
      Specified by:
      render in interface GamePhase
      Overrides:
      render in class BattlePhase
      Parameters:
      g - the Graphics object used for rendering

    • cleanup

      public void cleanup()
      Cleans up the Salvo battle phase when it ends. Clears the animation queue, resets the number of shots remaining, and invokes the parent class cleanup.
      Specified by:
      cleanup in interface GamePhase
      Overrides:
      cleanup in class BattlePhase
